metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12082 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the 'CustomData' Mesh loadingfunctionality of the Blender open-source 3d creation suite. A .blend filewith a specially crafted external data file can cause an integer overflowresulting in a buffer overflow which can allow for code execution under thecontext of the application. An attacker can convince a user to edit anobject within a .blend library in their Scene in order to trigger thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: blender: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
